name: comicz-viewer
description: A simple web based viewer for web-comics

scripts.dev: node .\node_modules\watchify\bin\cmd.js -t [ browserify-css --inlineImages true ] -t brfs main.js -o dist\bundle.js -s ComiczViewer -v
scripts.win_build: node .\node_modules\browserify\bin\cmd.js -t [ browserify-css --inlineImages true ] -t brfs main.js -o dist\bundle.js -s ComiczViewer
scripts.unix_build: node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t [ browserify-css --inlineImages true ] -t brfs main.js -o dist/bundle.js -s ComiczViewer

author: Jos√© Vicente Junior
